mapper.select: SELECT id, username, first_name, last_name, email, password, phone, is_active, created_at, updated_at FROM users
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, first_name, last_name, email, password, phone, is_active, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{isActive}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET username = #{username}, first_name = #{firstName}, last_name = #{lastName}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, is_active = #{isActive}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
